## About

This website is to promote Black owned businesses in Eugene, OR. Put this link on your social media to support our Black community.

## Black Business Owners

If you are a Black business owner, click this [link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1e7nEvFQVpagAC_ZzlDfW_Rm4X396wPdgyj8i8J1lNzM) to fill our our google form. We will update as much as possible.
